name: Scare Force One
description:
In Scare Force One, you are a member of an elite all monster combat unit with one mission: Protect the President of the United States from supernatural threats.

A modification of Lasers and Feelings by John Harper.

This file is two A4 pages, one horizontal (The Game) and one vertical (The Playbooks). Cut the Playbooks into 6 along the dotted lines. For an extra gnarly touch, print on yellow paper!
